content: 114 stitches start working in 2/2 ribs at 22 cm from the cast-on edge start decreasing next row *knit 2 together purl 2* until two sts remain knit these 2 sts 86 sts next row *purl 2 knit 1* until 2 sts remain purl these 2 sts next row *knit 2 purl 1* until 2 sts remain knit these 2 sts next row *purl 2 knit 1* until 2 sts remain purl these 2 sts next row *knit 2 knit 2 together* until one stitch remains knit this stitch 65 sts next row purl all sts next row knit all sts next row purl all sts next row *knit 2 knit 2 together* until 2 sts remain knit these 2 sts 49 sts next row purl all sts next row knit sts next row purl all sts next row *knit 1 knit 2 together* 33 sts next row purl all sts next row knit 1 *knit 2 together* until end of row 17 sts next row purl next row *knit 2 together* until one stitch remains knit 1 cut your yarn leaving an 8 inches tail pass it through the remaining 9 sts and pull the yarn sew the back seam of the hat being careful to change the sense of the seam on the last 5 cm for the brim
